column1: #Coronavirus IGNORES Finances, Generosity, Race, Age, Sex, LGBTQ, Moms, Dads, Sons, Daughters, Pets, Friends, CoWorkers #COVID19 DOES NOT RESPECT Employment, Disability, Nationality, Religion, Love, Philanthropy, Sports, GenX, Hunger, GenZ, Baby Boomers, Homelessness
You got it better than most, i have guys i havent been able to reach at all, harder then reaching a corona virus hotline!!!

YOUR EXPERIENCE MAY BE DIFFERENT I Make U No Promises & Tell U No Lies It's Day-27 in the hospital battling for my life against #Covid19 #Coronavirus Finally removed from VENTILATOR at 2am #Hydroxychloroquine did NOT work for me #REMDESIVIR UNdoubtedly has saved my life
